title: How Budget 2026 can improve ease of paying taxes
content: Budget 2026 should prioritize reforms in withholding taxes, dispute resolution, and customs procedures to enhance ease of doing business. Simplifying TDS, addressing tax dispute pendency, and accelerating customs automation are crucial for reducing complexity, building trust, and boosting investments.

title: Budget 2026: Top 5 income tax expectations of salaried, middle class taxpayers
content: Last year, FM Sitharaman announced major changes in the new income tax regime, and while tax experts believe that there is little fiscal room in Budget 2026 for any big tax income tweaks, there is also a hope that some changes may be brought about to further boost consumption.

title: IND vs NZ: Maiden T20I ton strengthens Kishan's case over Samson
content: Ishan Kishan achieved significant milestones, scoring his maiden T20I century (103 off 43 balls) and surpassing 1,000 T20I runs and 2,000 international runs for India. His explosive innings, part of a strong run of form, contributed to India's series-clinching victory over New Zealand.

title: IMF data puts India ahead of US in 2026 global real GDP growth; Elon Musk responds
content: India is set to lead global economic growth by 2026, surpassing the US, according to IMF data. Elon Musk highlighted this seismic shift, noting India and China will drive over 43% of worldwide expansion. This surge, fueled by domestic strength and manufacturing, signals a changing global economic landscape beyond traditional Western markets.

title: 'Victory for sport': When Chennai stood up for Pakistan after India lost Test match
content: Despite a politically charged atmosphere and extremist threats, the 1999 Chennai Test between India and Pakistan showcased remarkable sportsmanship. Sachin Tendulkar's valiant 136-run innings, battling injury, ultimately fell short as Pakistan secured a 12-run victory. The Chennai crowd's standing ovation for the victorious Pakistani team became a powerful testament to the spirit of sport.

title: Google cofounder makes biggest-ever public donation to tackle California housing crisis
content: Google co-founder Sergey Brin has made his largest public donation, contributing $20 million to a new coalition tackling California's housing crisis. This significant move, backed by other tech leaders, comes as the state's wealthy face a potential wealth tax. Brin's philanthropy has been substantial, with billions donated to various causes, including climate solutions and medical research.

title: Kishan's 42-ball century, Arshdeep fifer drive India to 46-run win over NZ
content: Ishan Kishan's explosive 42-ball century powered India to a massive 271/5, setting up a commanding 46-run victory over New Zealand. Kishan's blistering knock, coupled with Suryakumar Yadav's elegant 63, overwhelmed the visitors. Arshdeep Singh's crucial five-wicket haul sealed the 4-1 series triumph, showcasing India's strong T20 World Cup preparations.

title: 'Trashy ruminations of a convicted criminal': MEA rubbishes reference to PM Modi in Epstein files
content: India's Ministry of External Affairs has vehemently dismissed claims linking Prime Minister Narendra Modi to Jeffrey Epstein's leaked documents.  The ministry labelled the references as "trashy ruminations" from a convicted criminal, urging their immediate rejection. These statements follow the US Department of Justice's release of extensive materials related to the late financier.

title: Nvidia H-1B data reveals US pay as Jensen Huang reviews all compensation
content: Nvidia's soaring stock has created millionaires among its employees, with H-1B visa filings revealing substantial base salaries for critical roles. While CEO Jensen Huang emphasizes personal involvement in compensation, earlier hires have significantly benefited from equity appreciation. The data offers a glimpse into the pay for engineers, architects, researchers, and product managers, excluding bonuses and equity.

title: Paul George responds to NBA suspension for violating anti-drug program
content: Philadelphia Sixers star Paul George faces a 25-game suspension. He violated the NBA Anti-Drug Program after taking improper medication during mental health treatment. George takes responsibility for his actions. The ban costs him millions and impacts the Sixers' playoff hopes. The team must adapt without their key player as the season progresses.

title: Gold, silver price crash: $5 trillion lost in market cap; what led to the fall
content: Gold prices dropped by a whopping Rs 14,000 per 10 grams and silver prices tanked by Rs 20,000 per kg in Delhi on Friday. The sharp dip came after gold hit a fresh high of Rs 1,83,000 and silver of Rs 4,04,500 on Thursday.

title: Discover worthy reasons Bill Belichick missed a first-ballot Hall of Fame vote
content: Bill Belichick did not make the Pro Football Hall of Fame on his first ballot after voters focused on Spygate and his record without Tom Brady. According to Ian O’Connor of The Athletic, the debate was the longest of any candidate. Some voters defended Belichick, while others felt integrity concerns justified the delay.

title: Turning Point USA announces platforms for rival Super Bowl halftime show
content: After months of silence, Turning Point USA has finally confirmed how fans can watch its alternative Super Bowl LX halftime show. The broadcast will stream on YouTube, X, Rumble, and several conservative TV networks. While distribution details are now clear, Turning Point USA has not revealed performers or production plans, which still leaves viewers with the question of what they will see when they tune in.

title: New details in Ryan Wedding case as FBI links wife, associates to drug killings
content: Former Olympic snowboarder Ryan Wedding has pleaded not guilty to federal charges tied to drug trafficking and murder. US authorities say he led a billion-dollar drug ring uncovered through Operation Giant Slalom. Several alleged associates, including his wife, girlfriend, lawyer, and international partners, have been sanctioned, arrested, or face extradition, according to the FBI and US Department of Justice.

title: Gabrielle Union breaks silence on fertility issues with Dwyane Wade
content: Dwyane Wade and his wife, the popular actress Gabrielle Union, have had a beautiful and a healthy marriage ever since they tied the knot in 2014 after dating for a couple of years. While both Dwyane Wade and Gabrielle Union had been through divorce before, the popular actress did not have a biological child of her own unlike the NBA legend. As the two tried to expand their family, Gabrielle Union details the trauma she faced as she failed to conceive.

title: Budget 2026: What five years of data reveal about India’s direct and indirect taxes - explained
content: As Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman prepares the Union Budget 2026-27, tax data reveals a significant shift. Direct tax collections have surged, surpassing indirect taxes as the government's primary revenue source. This trend highlights a growing reliance on income and profit-based taxation, impacting fiscal strategy and taxpayer compliance.

title: 'Mi, Sunetra Ajit Pawar, pratigya karte ki … ': 'Clock' ticks on in a changed NCP
content: With Sunetra Pawar, Ajit Pawar’s wife and a Rajya Sabha member, sworn in as deputy CM on Saturday, stepping into the role held by her husband, the state has formally entered a new and uncertain phase, shaped by the vacuum left by Dada’s death. Sunetra Pawar’s elevation may have filled the immediate constitutional vacuum, but it has also foregrounded larger, unresolved questions about the NCP’s future, the ruling Mahayuti alliance’s stability, and the direction the state’s politics will take in the absence of one of its most influential power brokers.

title: Quote of the day by Jackie Chan: ‘Life will knock us down, but we can choose.....'
content: Global icon Jackie Chan, renowned for revolutionizing action-comedy, embodies resilience. His powerful quote, "Life will knock us down, but we can choose whether or not we get back up," delivered in 'The Karate Kid,' offers a universal life lesson.  This message echoes Chan's own challenging childhood, highlighting the choice to rise above adversity and achieve remarkable success.

title: SKY surpasses Kohli and Rohit, becomes fastest to this elusive record
content: India captain Suryakumar Yadav became the fastest player to reach 3000 T20I runs in terms of balls faced, achieving the milestone in 1822 deliveries and surpassing Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma. He scored 63 off 30 balls in the fifth T20I against New Zealand, while Ishan Kishan added an unbeaten 86, helping India post 189/3 in Thiruvananthapuram with an aggressive batting display.

title: Trumpiana: Bored Donnie and his forty winks!
content: President Trump's actions, from Cabinet meetings to policy decisions, are characterized by a pattern of deflection and strategic maneuvering.  He faces criticism for his handling of protests, immigration crackdowns, and attempts to influence the Federal Reserve, while his supporters praise his leadership and vision.

title: ‘Enough!’ Cardi B snaps at baby name rumors as Stefon Diggs’ son becomes internet obsession
content: Cardi B shuts down viral rumors about her baby boy’s name with Patriots star Stefon Diggs after fans speculate online. The rapper responds bluntly as she continues to protect her child’s privacy following the couple’s November 2025 birth.

title: Explosions reported at two locations in Iran; Israel denies involvement
content: A powerful explosion ripped through an eight-storey building in Iran's Bandar Abbas port city, causing significant damage to its structure, vehicles, and shops. While the cause remains under investigation, authorities have dismissed claims of a targeted attack. The incident occurs amidst escalating regional tensions and ongoing domestic unrest.

title: To be or not to be: Ajit Pawar’s death pushes Sharad Pawar into a Hamlet dilemma
content: Sharad Pawar faces a dilemma over merging NCP factions following Ajit Pawar's death. While initial merger talks were advanced, with a February 12 date set, uncertainty now looms. Sunetra Pawar's swift oath as deputy CM complicates matters, potentially forcing Sharad Pawar to align with the BJP, a move he has previously opposed.

title: Budget 2026: When arithmetic takes the stage on Sunday at 11 am
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman's Budget 2026 prioritizes continuity and fiscal discipline over populist measures.  Expect a focus on debt-to-GDP reduction and strategic capital expenditure, particularly in defense and manufacturing.  The budget signals a sober fiscal script, aiming for reassurance rather than grand pronouncements, with bond markets keenly watching for sustained credibility.

title: IPL: 'Wicket li toh pa'er chhu lunga' - PBKS spinner shares his Kohli dream
content: Punjab Kings' new signing Vishal Nishad revealed Virat Kohli's profound influence on his cricket career, calling him his idol. Nishad shared his challenging journey, overcoming family doubts and financial struggles to reach the IPL. He credits his tennis-ball background and supportive coach for his development as a bowler.

title: 'Film stars come and go': Piyush Goyal plays down actor Vijay’s impact on Tamil Nadu polls
content: Union minister Piyush Goyal dismissed actor Vijay's potential impact on Tamil Nadu elections, stating "many film stars come and go" and fan following doesn't guarantee votes. He expressed confidence in the AIADMK-led NDA alliance, citing strong anti-incumbency against the DMK government and visible rifts within their alliance.

title: In a first, Union Budget 2026 to be presented on Sunday
content: India's Union Budget 2026-27 will be presented on a Sunday for the first time in history, a significant procedural reform. Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman also achieves a record ninth consecutive budget presentation, marking a new milestone in the nation's financial reporting tradition.

title: How Sensex, Nifty have performed on Budget days in the past
content: ​Budgets set the direction for government spending, taxation, and growth priorities, but actual execution takes time. Sectors like infrastructure, railways, defence, and capital goods tend to react positively to higher capex announcements, while banks and consumption stocks respond to tax relief or income-support measures.

title: 'Oh my god': SKY goes viral after tricking crowd over Samson - Watch
content: India captain Suryakumar Yadav entertained fans before the fifth T20I against New Zealand by playfully pretending to forget Sanju Samson’s name at the toss in Thiruvananthapuram. He later confirmed Samson’s inclusion, drawing cheers from the crowd. India chose to bat first due to dew concerns. With the series already in India's pocket, the match served as preparation for the upcoming T20 World Cup.

title: Sunetra Pawar is new Maha dy CM: Wives who inherited husbands' political legacy
content: Sunetra Pawar has been sworn in as Maharashtra's Deputy Chief Minister, succeeding her late husband Ajit Pawar. Elected NCP legislature party leader, she will assume his portfolios, excluding finance. This move echoes historical instances of women stepping into politics to uphold family legacies after their husbands' passing.

title: Economic Survey: Degrees are rising, job certainty isn’t; tomorrow’s Budget gets tested here
content: The Economic Survey 2025–26 reads like a map of where Indian education quietly loses people—after Class 8, at the school-to-work handover, and in the steady outward rush of students seeking predictability. On Budget eve, the question isn’t another scheme. It’s whether spending will strengthen the weak joints—so families don’t have to keep paying privately for certainty.

title: 'Give me Zimbabwe or I'll retire': Babar Azam falls for 2; triggers criticism
content: Babar Azam's struggles continued in the T20I series against Australia, as he was dismissed for just 2 runs by Adam Zampa in the second match. This low score has sparked debate on social media, with some questioning his place in Pakistan's T20 squad.

title: 'Insult to fans': Pakistan cricket erupts; slams Australia amid T20 WC row
content: Pakistan expresses concern over visiting SENA teams resting key players, following a second-string Australia's T20I loss. Australia's decision to rest several top players for the series, citing recovery and World Cup preparation, has drawn criticism from former Pakistani cricketers and analysts who view it as an insult to their cricket.

title: WWE Royal Rumble 2026: Full card, predictions and 30th entrant tease
content: WWE's historic Royal Rumble 2026 in Riyadh features a stacked card, including AJ Styles' career-ending match against Gunther and Sami Zayn defending the Undisputed WWE Championship against Drew McIntyre. Both 30-person Royal Rumble matches are set to headline the event, with predictions favoring Liv Morgan for the women's match and Roman Reigns or Bron Breakker for the men's.

title: Kit launch cancelled! Are Pakistan on the brink of boycotting the T20 World Cup?
content: Pakistan's participation in the ICC T20 World Cup 2026 is shrouded in uncertainty despite squad announcements and scheduled departure. Rumors of a boycott persist, fueled by a cancelled kit launch and PCB's stance on security concerns, with a final decision expected soon.

title: WWE Royal Rumble: Live results and analysis
content: Will Gunther put an end to AJ Styles' career? We break down all the action from Royal Rumble in Riyadh.

title: NBA suspends 76ers forward George 25 games
content: Veteran 76ers forward Paul George has been suspended without pay for 25 games for taking "improper medication," according to George.

title: Sources: Bills to hire Leonhard to run defense
content: Former Bills player Jim Leonhard is expected to be hired as the team's defensive coordinator, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

title: QB Simpson: Transfer would've tarnished legacy
content: Former Alabama quarterback Ty Simpson said he is "absolutely" content with entering the NFL draft, adding it would "tarnish my legacy" to stay in college and play for another school.

title: Lightning expect Hedman OK for Stadium Series
content: Lightning defenseman Victor Hedman is expected to return to the lineup for Sunday's Stadium Series game against the Bruins. Hedman has been out since early December due to an elbow injury.

title: Giants co-owner Tisch named in latest Epstein file...
content: Giants co-owner Steve Tisch's name appears at least 440 times among millions of documents in the latest release of Jeffrey Epstein files, including some that show Epstein connected him to numerous women.

title: Protesters rally against ICE unit at Milan Olympic...
content: Hundreds of demonstrators gathered in Milan to protest the deployment of U.S. ICE agents ahead of the Winter Olympics, which begin next week.

title: Poll: Peterson, Dybantsa top NBA draft prospects
content: Kansas shooting guard Darryn Peterson and BYU forward AJ Dybantsa loom as the projected top two picks in the upcoming NBA draft. Who will be No. 1? ESPN polled 20 NBA scouts and executives to get an early vibe.

title: Rybakina rallies to stop Sabalenka for Aussie titl...
content: Elena Rybakina won the Australian Open title with a 6-4, 4-6, 6-4 victory over top-ranked Aryna Sabalenka that avenged her loss in the championship decider in 2023.

title: ✍ Ranking NFL coaching hires of past five years
content: Who are the most successful coaching hires since 2021? And how do the Super Bowl coaches stack up? We ranked all 37 moves.

title: Inside the 'most dangerous gym in America,' where Eagles' WR A.J. Brown trained
content: Diamond Gym doesn't just build muscle -- it tests the resolve of everyone who walks through the door.

title: Florida is taking national title contender form
content: The defending national champions are building a case to move up the bracket -- and as a threat to repeat.

title: Who will win the Australian Open men's title?
content: Carlos Alcaraz will take on Novak Djokovic in the final -- with a lot of history on the line. Here's how each can win.

title: NBA trade intel: Could the Bucks keep Giannis? Eve...
content: Tim Bontemps and Brian Windhorst examine eight East contenders, and how a Giannis trade could alter the conference hierarchy.

title: The Seahawks have a short-yardage threat: AJ Barne...
content: Mike Macdonald wanted more first downs -- so the Seahawks created a tush push play that fans dubbed the "Barnyard."

title: Teofimo Lopez Jr., Shakur Stevenson went from spar...
content: In 2016, Shakur Stevenson and Teofimo Lopez Jr. sparred at a Miami gym. On Saturday, they fight for much more.

title: UFC 325 picks: Experts split on Volkanovski-Lopes ...
content: Alexander Volkanovski beat Diego Lopes to reclaim UFC gold in April, but don't expect a one-sided rematch

title: 'Bulldoze these guys': Alexander Volkanovski's vow...
content: A lot has changed since his last fight, but a late-career lingering UFC narrative remains a constant.

title: Biggest looming free agent decisions for every tea...
content: NFL free agency starts on March 11. What does the future look like for these 32 soon-to-be free agents?

title: NFL betting wrapped: Seahawks-Patriots Super Bowl ...
content: Before Super Bowl LX kicks off, let's take a look at the year in review, with all the bad beats, teams on repeat and more.

title: Super Bowl betting buzz: Public backing JSN touchd...
content: In early Super Bowl LX betting, Jaxon Smith-Njigba leads all players in touchdown prop betting volume.

title: Women's Bracketology: Did upset of Iowa save USC's...
content: In danger of falling out of the field, USC got its most important win of the season Thursday. Mississippi State also got a big one.

title: Power Rankings: Can Tennessee test UConn?
content: The Lady Vols return to the rankings ahead of their date with the No. 1 Huskies, the nation's last unbeaten team.

title: Over to you, City: Arsenal recover power and poise...
content: Mikel Arteta believes Arsenal can win the league by dominating possession, set pieces and sending on "finishers" to complete the job. The 4-0 win over Leeds was a blueprint for that plan.

title: How bright is your team's future? Ranking all 30 f...
content: Who has the most talent in the minors? Here's how every organization stacks up entering the 2026 season.

title: Copy of Copy of Transfer rumors, news: Liverpool move for Inter de...
content: Liverpool have made an initial inquiry to Internazionale about signing right back Denzel Dumfries. Transfer Talk has the latest.

title: What to do with Giannis? The best- and worst-case ...
content: With Giannis Antetokounmpo rumored to be in his final days with Milwaukee, Andre Snellings takes a look at the possible destinations and which would be best and worst for his fantasy value.

title: The Great Nicobar project | Between the sea and the state
content: The ₹72,000-crore mega-infrastructure initiative, which envisions transforming the remote outpost into a major transshipment and defence hub, has sparked procedural, ecological and displacement concerns

title: Sunetra Pawar | Out of the shadows
content: Ajit Pawar’s wife has large shoes to fill as she takes on the twin responsibilities of party leadership and the role of Deputy Chief Minister of Maharashtra

title: Number of backward taluks rise in Karnataka, 93 classified most backward, 36 more backward, 43 backward
content: About 60% of the backward taluks are concentrated in north Karnataka, the most backward concentrated in Kalaburagi division, followed by Belagavi division

title: Negotiations with DMK progressing well: TNCC president
content: He criticises the “pointless speculation” in the media over the alliance, linking the Congress and Tamilaga Vettri Kazhagam

title: Hoax bomb threat to Vellore Collectorate
content: Police said the threat, received through an email to Vellore Collectorate around 2.45 p.m., warned of a possible explosion at the Collectorate office

title: Unified digital identity systems have many academic benefits, says expert
content: APAAR and SAMARTH play a key role in strengthening transparency, portability, and efficiency in higher education, says APSCHE Vice-Chairperson

title: Special package for Amaravati is on wishlist of CII A.P. ahead of Union Budget
content: Confederation of Indian Industry also expects approval of revised cost for Polavaram project, special fund for backward districts and support for MSMEs

title: Watch: UGC equity regulations controversy | Explained | Talking Politics
content: This week on “Talking Politics”, we will discuss all about the controversy over new UGC equity regulations and how it has become a political hot potato

title: YSRCP leader Ambati Rambabu arrested for ‘creating hurdles’ for police
content: Wife files a house motion petition in the High Court alleging illegal detention and failure of the police to provide protection

title: KCR faults wall pasting of letter by phone-tapping case IO, says he’s ready for examination today
content: The ex-CM and Leader of the Opposition in Assembly cites Supreme Court judgements, Cr.P.C. provisions to highlight that IO is duty-bound to record his statement at place of his stay

title: India’s media sector undergoing rapid transformation: Union Minister L. Murugan
content: Speaking at BES Expo 2026, the Minister said technology has completely changed the way content is created, distributed, and consumed

title: BJP demands Supreme Court-monitored SIT probe into Anandapur warehouse fire
content: At a press conference, BJP spokesperson Guru Prakash Paswan said that 27 people had lost their lives so far and that several others were still missing

title: Anandapur warehouse fire puts spotlight on illegal construction on East Kolkata Wetlands
content: Experts warn that such rapid encroachment of the wetlands, which are a natural filter for sewage water, can lead to long-term damage to the ecology of the city and its surroundings

title: Tharoor signals active involvement in UDF’s Assembly campaign after meeting Kerala Opposition leader
content: Leader of the Opposition V.D. Satheesan calls on Mr. Tharoor at the latter’s house in Thiruvananthapuram on Saturday

title: Many promotee IAS officers from Karnataka reluctant to attend induction training at Mussoorie
content: Only one officer is going for ITP, starting on February 2 this year, while the remaining 25 whose names figure in the list have not even submitted requests to the government for permission to attend

title: Kerala for All: Final day of conclave to deliberate on shaping the future of Kerala tourism
content: Day two of ‘Kerala for All’ to focus on governance, innovation, and implementation, bringing policymakers and industry leaders together to embed inclusivity into Kerala’s tourism future

title: Centre forms expert panel on healthcare for transgender persons
content: The crucial move was preceded by an advisory panel constituted, last year, on the direction of the Supreme Court in a case regarding a transwoman, who reportedly faced employment discrimination on account of her gender identity

title: El Nino on the horizon during monsoon months
content: IMD says there is “probability” of an El Nino, but no clarity till April; “early” climate models signal a likely El Nino in 2026, raising the risk of a “sub-par monsoon and drought conditions over India,” says Skymet

title: Malayalam theatre steals the spotlight at ITFoK
content: Five powerful productions blend ritual, memory, dream and dissent, demonstrating how Malayalam theatre continues to reinvent itself while engaging sharply with history, faith, memory, displacement and power

title: BRS calls for peaceful protests against SIT notice to KCR
content: KTR asks how the notice would be pasted to the wall of Nandinagar residence when KCR himself wrote to SIT stating that he’s staying at Erravelli and future notices be sent there

title: Truck driven on wrong side crushes five bikers to death in Odisha
content: The accident occurred on the Gosain Nuagaon overbridge when the speeding truck ploughed into traffic, crushing five bike riders under its wheels; eight injured persons were rushed to a nearby hospital, where the condition of two was reported to be critical

title: Economic Survey confirms distress under BJP government: Kharge
content: The Congress president targets the BJP over the decline in manufacturing growth, youth unemployment, rising trade deficit, and weakening household finances

title: Migrant waste collectors in Bengaluru lose jobs amid repeated travels for SIR; many to skip process
content: Many workers acknowledged their dilemma, as failing to appear for verification could mean losing voting rights, facing difficulties in proving residence identity, accessing welfare schemes, ration cards, and other official benefits

title: DMK speakers to launch campaign from February 1
content: DMK would highlight the achievements of the Dravidian Model government while exposing the betrayal of the BJP-led Union government at the Centre

title: Efforts on to make available medicines for transplant patients at subsidised rates: Minister
content: Helath Minister stressed the need to strengthen institutional framework and make organ transplant surgeries more accessible

title: Water released from Sathanur dam in Tiruvannamalai for irrigation
content: Officials of the Water Resources Department, which maintains the facility, say water is being released into the river and distributed to the left and right bank canals from the pick-up dam for 100 days, up to May 11, for irrigation

title: Humayun Kabir blames West Bengal CM for his communal remarks
content: Humayun Kabir said he had made the remarks at the behest of Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee who had asked him to ensure victory to the Trinamool Congress candidates Yusuf Pathan and Abu Taher in the 2024 Lok Sabha elections

title: MEA denies Epstein claim that U.S. played a role in PM’s 2017 visit to Israel
content: MEA clarification follows release of Epstein mails discussing the Israel visit, PMO meetings, U.S.-India relations during Trump 1.0; also includes emails from Hardeep Puri to Epstein, and from Epstein to Anil Ambani

title: Dredging of Upputeru sought to check crop inundation in West Godavari district
content: Fresh survey to be carried out for canal modernisation in Godavari delta; Tanuku MLA highlights the need for a retaining wall along Gosthani river

title: Private agri. varsity study selected for showcasing at ISTA meet in Canada
content: The AI-based seed germination evaluation system tested on 62 paddy, maize, bajra varieties enhances accuracy of testing

title: Congress not against high-speed rail project, says Satheesan
content: The Leader of the Opposition said the project must be environmentally sustainable and financially viable for Kerala

title: Taking forward the comprehensive plan to end the Gaza conflict is today a widely shared priority: Jaishankar
content: The External Affairs Minister said multiple conflicts in the Arab world stretching from Libya to Sudan to Gaza “impacts us all, and India as a proximate region” and called for strengthening ‘forces of stability, peace and prosperity’

title: Vigilance wing seizes banned gutka worth ₹2.72 crore in Tirupati region
content: Over 2,020 bags of prohibited tobacco products seized in coordinated raids across Tirupati and Chittoor districts; cases booked against traders and transporters, officials warn of zero tolerance on illegal trade

title: A month since major blaze, Broadway firefighting plans yet to take off
content: While there is no word yet from the authorities on chalking out a concrete plan to keep the street safe from potential fire accidents, steps are yet to be initiated to decongest the roads which remain the biggest challenge for firefighters to navigate through the street in case of an emergency

title: Two polytechnic lecturers suspended over fake research publications
content: The lecturers were found to have submitted predatory journals along with their applications for the career advancement scheme

title: Government in the process of developing a NoRKA police station: Kerala Chief Minister
content: Speaking at the valedictory session of the fifth Loka Kerala Sabha, Pinarayi Vijayan criticises Union government for its ‘serious inaction” in introducing the draft Overseas Mobility (Facilitation and Welfare) Bill in Parliament

title: Kerala for All conclave: State’s political legacy will not allow curbs on people, says expert
content: The latest social media-fuelled tourism, especially ‘Insta tourism,’ triggers mass movement of people to one place or another destination for a certain period, leaving an impact on the environment and ecology around the destinations, says D. Dhanuraj, Founder-Chairman of CPPR

title: 'Operation Herof': Massive firing erupts across Pakistan, 10 policemen, 37 rebels killed

title: Charter operator VSR was benched by EU regulator before Pawar plane crash
content: a "Level 1" safety finding is EASA's most serious category of non-compliance, issued when a safety risk cannot be ruled out or when an operator fails to cooperate with regulatory oversight . the company failed to provide documents and information repeatedly sought in the learjet 45 accident in Mumbai .

title: Power tussle in states: Why is Congress leadership shying away from hard decisions
content: if the local body election results in Kerala are an indication to go by, the state may turn to Congress-led UDF after 10 years . Shashi Tharoor, who was for many years the brightest Congress star in Kerala, has of late been a source of constant embarrassment for the grand-old party .

title: Operation Trashi-I: Fresh gunfight in J&K after forces re-establish contact with terrorists
content: a fresh contact was established between security forces and a group of terrorists on the 14th day of an ongoing search operation, codenamed Trashi-I . this is the fourth time in the past two weeks that a contact has been established with the terrorists .

title: Fight over home loan EMI led to commando's killing by husband: Cops
content: Devanshi Mehta is a crime correspondent uncovering Delhi’s unseen crisis—addiction, systemic violence, and the quiet suffering of women, children, and marginalised communities. Her reporting brings nuance to the headlines, focusing on those forgotten by the system. Through deeply reported stories, she explores the human cost of crime, neglect, and broken justice. Read More

title: Sunetra is Maharashtra deputy CM; Sharad Pawar says not in loop
content: sunetra pawar was sworn in as first woman deputy chief minister of Maharashtra . 62-year-old replaced her husband Ajit pawar just three days after his death . she will hold state excise, sports and youth welfare and minority development and aukaf .

title: Tech fete held at Christ Nagar College
content: e-Paper The View From India Looking at World Affairs from the Indian perspective . first day first show news and reviews from the world of cinema and streaming . the weekly newsletter from science writers takes the jargon out of science and puts the fun in!

title: Elevation done, challenges next: How Sunetra Pawar faces tough road ahead as Maha deputy CM
content: The TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide. With an unwavering commitment to excellence in journalism, our team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics. The TOI News Desk is your trusted source for staying informed and connected to the ever-evolving global landscape, ensuring that our readers are equipped with the latest developments that matter most." title: 'I Have Quit Congress': Navjot Kaur Slams Congress's Punjab Chief
content: Congress leader Navjot Kaur Sidhu on Saturday said she has quit the party, while hitting out at its Punjab unit chief, Amrinder Singh Raja Warring, for allegedly "damaging" the organisation and calling him "corrupt president ever".

title: N Sitharaman To Unveil 'Tariff-Proof' Roadmap For India In Budget 2026
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman will on February 1 present her ninth straight Budget, which is expected to unveil measures to sustain growth momentum, and contain reforms that could buffer the economy from global trade frictions.

title: Tech Giants Seek Massive AI, Digital Infrastructure Push In Budget 2026
content: Technology firms are expecting the Union Budget 2026-27 to push for development of the AI ecosystem, including innovation, digital infrastructure, across sectors, and provide liquidity in the market for its adoption.

title: Trump's Climate Ambassadors: Why Fat Polar Bears Are Healthier Than A Generation Ago
content: In the icy wilderness of Svalbard, the Norwegian archipelago in the Barents Sea, polar bears have been entangled in the politics of climate change.

title: Delhi To Construct Foot Over Bridges At Accident-Prone Crossings For Safety
content: For thousands of pedestrians in Delhi, crossing a busy road often means waiting endlessly for a break in traffic or taking a risky dash across speeding vehicles.

title: Woman Killed By Father, Brother. She Wanted To Marry A 'Distant Relative'
content: A case of suspected honour killing has come to light in Gonda district, where a 19-year-old woman was allegedly murdered by her father and brother for wanting to marry a distant relative, police said on Saturday.

title: India May Achieve USD 2 Trillion Exports Target By 2032: Piyush Goyal
content: The target of taking India's goods and services exports to USD 2 trillion is likely to be achieved around 2032, instead of the earlier goal of 2030, due to global uncertainties, Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal said on Saturday.

title: 'Madhya Pradesh Officer Suspended Over Rs 2.7 Crore 'Stamp Scam'
content: The Madhya Pradesh government on Saturdaysuspendedthe districttreasuryofficerofGunainconnection with alleged irregularitiesinthesaleofstamps causing a loss ofRs2.70croreto the exchequer, officials said.

title: In Relationship With Married Man, Telangana Woman Sets His Wife, Son On Fire
content: A woman allegedly killed a man's wife and their infant son by setting them on fire at a village in Telangana's Nalgonda district on Saturday, police said.

title: BJP vs Trinamool Fight Escalates Over Kolkata Warehouse Fire Incident
content: Union Home Minister Amit Shah slammed the Trinamool Congress government in West Bengal over the warehouse fire in Anandapur that claimed at least 27 lives.

title: 'Life And Death Fight For Assam': Himanta Sarma Raises Pitch On "Miya" Row
content: The political flashpoint over Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma's "Miya" remarks shows no signs of cooling down. In his latest comments, the chief minister doubled down, calling the issue a "life-and-death fight for the Assamese people."

title: "Trashy Ruminations By Convicted Criminal": India On PM's Mention In Epstein Files
content: India on Friday moved swiftly to reject any suggestion of impropriety after Prime Minister Narendra Modi's name surfaced in a reference contained in newly released United States Justice Department files linked to Jeffrey Epstein.

title: CRPF's Three-Pronged Strategy To Eliminate Terrorism In J&K
content: The Central Reserve Police Force says it is adopting a three-pronged strategy to achieve total elimination of terrorism from Jammu and Kashmir and asked its rank and file to work for achieving the objective.

title: Probe Agency Attaches Ex-Health Director's Property Valued At Rs 9.79 Crore
content: The Enforcement Directorate (ED) said on Saturday that it has attached properties valued at approximately Rs 9.79 crore belonging toformerMadhya Pradesh health director Dr Amarnath Mittal and his wife, Dr Alka Mittal.

title: Goa Police Arrest Two From Assam Over Rs 1.42-Crore 'Digital Arrest' Fraud
content: The Cyber Crime Police Station, Goa, has arrested two persons in connection with a major inter-state cyber fraud case involving a "digital arrest" scam worth Rs1.42 crore, police said on Saturday.

title: KCR To Appear For Questioning In 'Phone-Tapping' Case On Feb 1
content: Former Chief Minister K Chandrasekhar Rao on Saturday told the Telangana SIT probing "phone tapping" during the previous BRS regime that he would appear for questioning on February 1.

title: 6 Killed, 3 Injured After Truck Rams 2 Autorickshaws In UP's Agra
content: Six people were killed and three injured when a container truck collided head-on with two autorickshaws in the Khandauli police station area of Agra on Saturday, police said.

title: Family Takes Body Home In A Pushcart After Hospital Said No To Ambulance
content: A 35-year-old woman battling tuberculosis died at the Badshah Khan Civil Hospital here, and her family said that they were forced to carry her body home on a motorised pushcart for nearly 12 kilometres.

title: Ex-Prince Andrew Seen On All Fours Over Woman In Fresh Epstein File Images
content: Britain's former prince Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor was embroiled again in the Epstein scandal after the US Justice Department released multiple photos of him crouched over on all fours over a woman lying on the floor.

title: Gold or bust? X factors for all 12 men's Olympic h...
content: team USA is on the cusp of a true best-on-best international hockey tournament . Connor McDavid , Auston Matthews , Mikko Rantanen , Leon Draisaitl , David Pastrnak have all been superstars in the NHL for the better part of 10 years . that changes in the next fortnight .

title: NHL Power Rankings: Updated 1-32 poll, each team's...
content: the calendar ticks one week closer to the start of the 2026 Olympic Games . a big February game upcoming has been identified for each club . previous ranking refers to the previous edition, published Jan. 23 . it's time for another set of ESPN NHL Power Rankings .

title: Could history repeat at Man United? Carrick and So...
content: the comparisons between the caretaker appointments of Ole Gunnar Solskjr and Michael Carrick are obvious . it might not end there, but the similarities are hard to escape . there are murmurings among excited supporters that United could already have the right man in the dugout .

title: Lopez-Stevenson picks: Can power crack Shakur's de...
content: Teofimo Lopez will put his WBO junior welterweight title on the line against Shakur Stevenson at Madison Square Garden in new york . the former unified lightweight champion is the fourth defense of the belt he won with a unanimous decision over Josh Taylor .

title: Behind the scenes at Driveline: How the lab that g...
content: 16 broken baseball bats hang on a wall inside driveline's 15,000-square-foot facility . the broken bats are a badge of honor -- a symbol of work done with requisite intensity . Edgar Quero, 22, stepped into a batting cage just a few feet away .

title: No gap year here: How Boston retooled a fractured ...
content: a simple question was lobbed his way inside TD Garden's home locker room . a smirk crossed the point guard's face before the question was even finished . the Celtics are 30-18 and tied for second place in the Eastern Conference .

title: Why the LA Clippers are suddenly the hottest team ...
content: the LA Clippers beat the Pistons 112-99 in the premier league . assistant coach Brian Shaw doesn't like comparing anyone to Kobe Bryant . he's reluctantly an authority on the matter, but he sees shades of Bryant in recent play .

title: Five teams with contract extension dilemmas
content: Marcus Spears is interested in George Pickens' free agent market this offseason . we're heading into contract extension season . some of these big deals are intertwined with others . a few teams with interesting extortion deals are also interested in the market .

title: European live updates: Arsenal aim to bounce back ...
content: arsenal beat Leeds united 4-0 to extend lead at top of the table to seven points . a 0-0 draw to Nottingham Forest and 3-2 loss to manchester united ended in 2-2 draw . west ham hosted west Ham united in a London derby with goals galore .

title: Super Bowl-bound Patriots follow in Mack Hollins' bare footsteps
content: a glass drops and shatters in the new England Patriots' cafeteria . a record scratch might as well ring out from the amps on the nearby practice field . Mack Hollins hasn't consistently worn shoes in the past decade .
